price: 46. Waxayna tabeeyeen tab xun, tabtooda xun se waxaa (ka war) hayay Alle, inkastoo tabtooda xun ahayd mid (daran) ay la baabba’aan buuruhu15.
arabic: وَقَدۡ مَكَرُواْ مَكۡرَهُمۡ وَعِندَ ٱللَّهِ مَكۡرُهُمۡ وَإِن كَانَ مَكۡرُهُمۡ لِتَزُولَ مِنۡهُ ٱلۡجِبَالُ
footnotes: 15. Tafsiir kale waa tabtooda xun kuma filneyn inay ka qaadaan buuraha meelahooda, macna kale waa kuma lahayn wax saameys ah doonista Alle.

version.title: Somali translation - Jacob
version.description: Translation of the meanings of the Noble Qur'an into the Somali language, translated by Abdullah Hasan Jacob.

meta.transliteration: waqad makarū makrahum waʿinda al-lahi makruhum wa-in kāna makruhum litazūla min'hu al-jibālu
